review.comment: We needed a home inspector quickly and even though David was booked, he made time for us!  He and his colleague showed up on time and were both so courteous,  I felt like we were in good hands right away.  After the inspection David asked if I would like a summary since it would take until later that evening to receive my report.  We sat for about an hour (sorry David) because I had so many questions.  David took his time not only explaining but educating me on his findings.  When I received his report, I was so impressed with his attention to detail! It's hard to find people these days that are really good at what they do, and and take the extra time to really help you, but David is one of these people!  It was truly a blessing to work with him and I would recommend him to anyone who is looking for an inspector! Thank you and God Bless you David!

(Translated by Google) A very professional inspector, I recommend him 100%, I loved his work.

(Original)
Un inspector muy profecional, lo recomiendo al 100% me encanto su trababajo.

Really enjoyed talking to David and noticing his attention to details when inspecting my future home. Very personal and friendly. I appreciate all the information he gave me. Very good price to for the size of my home. Will recommend to family and friends.
David and his team were great. Inspection was very thorough and much appreciated.

(Translated by Google) Highly recommended, they are very professional in their work, they do a very complete inspection.

(Original)
Muy recomendable ,son muy profesionales en su trabajo ,hacen una inspección muy completa .

We are very pleased with David’s work. This is our second time purchasing a home. We are coming from Nashville,TN so you could understand how a great inspection we where looking for. David met our expectations and more, detailed, responsive, very knowledgeable! What amazed me was he physically checked the roof (no drone) our first home inspector was no way compared to my second experience. I can’t stress this enough this company is AMAZING if this had  rating of ten starts, I would most definitely rate it that.
Thank you so much for such amazing job.

The Rodriguez Family
Soon to be San Antonio residents
David is a phenomenal home inspector! Very helpful, knowledgeable, and will go above and beyond for you. I highly recommend David if you're trying to get a professional and thorough inspection.

Amazing experience with David and his team.  Responsive, thorough, and the inspection report was completed same day as inspection.  He communicates well and follows up later for any questions or concerns.  I highly recommend Monsivais Reliable Home Inspection.

He may be a GREAT home inspector but a terrible driver. Get off your phone and drive. I watched you swerving all over the road for 8 miles without the ability to pass you because you were doing 60 mph in the left lane beside another vehicle in a 70 mph speed limit. When I did pass you it was obvious that you were swerving because you were staring at your phone in you little orange Jeep.
David was incredibly professional and thorough. I would strongly recommend his services.

Straight to the point, and polite. They did not sugar coat anything and explained all of their findings. We were welcomed to be at the house during the inspection. I will definitely use their services again and strongly recommend them.

Covid precautions taken very seriously. I am not surprised at how many overwhelming 5-star reviews he has. Let me share why I chose 5 stars....

David has inspected multiple properties for me and I will continue to hire him as he is consistently efficient, insightful, knowledgeable, and he embodies integrity. I've been very pleased with all three inspections he has done for me.

This last inspection he was an integral part of when I had a re-inspect in which the seller's fix it guy faked a electrician's license number. It was David's feedback that led me to go look up the license which I learned was fraudulent.

This experience has brought out the best in this company. He is exactly why you hire inspectors. It saves you from making a large purchase in which people say are repaired but we're not. He protects you from fraudulent claims and from bad repair jobs as well.

He is thorough and because of that quality, we have caught instances where plumbing was left unconnected and running water was seen under the home (not all inspectors would have caught this).

Further, he hires out the termite portion of the inspection and even that guy is incredible!  The reports are fantastically detailed so the professional can go in and fix what needs to be fixed. They're also written in a clear and concise manner so the average person can understand where there may be deficiencies.

Good luck and thank you, David!

If I could give David more than 5 stars I would! David is a true professional, and has you in his best interests. Have no worry that every nook and cranny will be inspected be he will not miss a thing. His reports are sent in, in a timely manner and he will personally walk you through it so that you understand everything. David sir, you are a true rock star!!!

Mr. Monsivais is a top notch, professionally licensed inspector. He provided in-depth professional service that saved me from purchasing a lemon of a house. I highly recommend him to anyone looking to buy a house in San Antonio.

I cannot say enough positive things about this company. Our realtor who has been in the business for >12 years recommended David to us due to years of good service. We are first time home buyers and David helped us to not loose thousands of dollars. He pays attention to details that we never noticed and picked up on multiple short cuts that the renovating contractor took to save money which would ultimately have cost us a lot if it was missed. He worked hard to compile a very detailed report including photos of all the deficiencies he found and sent it to us on the day of the inspection.
If you are looking for someone to do a thorough investigation and truly tell you exactly what you're paying for he is the guy. We would definitely be using his services in the future again.

We are trying to buy a second home in San Antonio.  We went under contract and our realtor ordered a home inspection.   The report came back with NO checking of the foundation for level.   Being a 60 year old pier and beam home I demanded that we have an engineer, foundation company, or another inspector look at the level of the home and crawl underneath it.   We were getting short on option time and our realtor found David.   A reasonable price and next day service to tell us that the foundation is in bad need of repair. Needless to say I am not very happy with the first home inspector.   If you are in need of a COMPLETE home inspection hire David.   He will inspect and tell you the way it is.  Keep up the good work David!!!!   If this purchase fails through I'll be calling you.

Wow, the expertise that was provided has exceeded my expectations.
I highly recommend to anyone, looking to purchase a house...Give a call to Monsivais Inspection. You will NOT be disappointed.

Purchasing a home can be a daunting experience for a first time home buyer. I choose Monsivais Inspections for their impeccable reputation and renowned expertise. I am so thankful that I made this decision and am incredibly grateful to David and his team for their patience in educating me about the inspection process. As the inspection transpired, they kindly explained what they were doing, helping me to become more knowledgeable about the nuances of the home I was considering. This attention to detail allowed me to make the best decision for my family. I am so appreciative for everything! I highly recommend Monsivais Inspections...Your best interests are truly their top priority!

Before purchasing a One Year old  Beautiful home we hired Monsivias Inspections and I am so glad we did !  Monisivias inspections Saved us over 300k and from a nightmare waiting to happen.  This home was beautiful and absolutely perfect to the average buyer. What we could not see was another story..  This home was not built to code and many short cuts were taken . We were willing to pay top dollar for this home and Thanks to Monsivias Inspections in San Antonio we did not. This home was beautiful from the outside and Ugly on the inside. Some of the problems the inspectors found were inside the walls, to the entire stucco exterior needing to be re done due to no weep holes that cause mold in the walls,  the roof under-layment that was installed backwards and nothing was to fire code, not even the fire place! The list could go on and on... Who would think a 1 yr old newly built beautiful home could have so many problems. Thankfully We hired the Best Monsivias Inspections were efficient , Through and Communicative. The report, pictures and how they took time to explain there findings exceeded our expectations. We would recommend Monsivias Inspections to all of our friends and family and we definitely will be calling them again when we find our dream home.

I encountered Monsivais Inspections as a first-time homebuyer looking to purchase a home for my family while my husband was working out-of-state. I so appreciate the thorough, honest service David and his assistant provided us. They answered all of my questions and allowed me to follow them throughout the inspection so that I could learn more about the home. For perhaps the first time in this home search, I felt that someone was genuinely looking out for my best interest as a buyer, and their report allowed me to make a clear, confident decision about a home we were considering. David is a highly-qualified professional who really knows his business, and I highly recommend him to any nervous first-time buyers like myself :)

David is a valuable asset to our first homebuying process. We are very pleased with his responsiveness and commitment in providing us with the best service and knowledge possible.
He also holds the highest designation with the Texas Real State Commission, assuring us we have nothing to worry about !
Thank you for your patience in explaining everything from start to finish!
Recommended to all.
-Martin & Emily

David is a very detail oriented inspector. He inspected every square inch of the house including going into the attic and roof. He is very approachable and likes to explain things as he does the inspection. I am a first time home buyer, he was kind enough to help me explain what details to pay attention too along with how to tackle those issues.  David's is also quick in giving the report back, he had it done the same day as the inspection. The report was on point and has given me a better scope of the repairs the house needs before I purchase. Will hire him again if I need another house inspected and will recommend him to my family and friends.
Update 2020 - I got David to inspect another property and let me tell you, he did an amazing job in finding details with the property that were not easily visible for the untrained eye. He worked very long hours to get the report done on time as the closing of a home is very time sensitive. If I could give him 10 stars I would. He will be continued to be hired in the future and referred to anyone of my circle of family and friends. Don't think twice with this inspector!
review.review_reply:
Thank you Yoshío, you had very good questions and we are so glad we were able to help and be a part of your home purchase process.

Additionally,  thank you for your comments regarding the google search and  recommendations of redirecting of an older site I've got out there, I am thankful and grateful.
Be Blessed.

review.comment: David was wonderful! The property that we are purchasing already had an inspection completed on it a month prior yet we hired David just in case. I’m so happy that we did, he found that the underlayment was not put under the shingles. A HUGE problem and one that was missed by the other inspector.  David saved us a ton of headaches, time and thousands of dollars. Seriously, go with David. He’s honest and he knows what he’s doing! Another plus, he cares (practically unheard of in most businesses today). We are extremely grateful for Monsivais Inspections.
review.review_reply:
Thank you for your kind words.
Through constant learning and continuous improvement, we utilize our knowledge to achieve our full business potential. We use this knowledge to solve problems, advance our industry and make a difference to our customers.

Thank you for being our customer

review.comment:
Mr. Monsivais could not be better. He's friendly, professional, courteous, and extremely knowledgeable. We had an accepted offer in on a house, and were certain it was the right place for us. However, Mr. Monsivais found several issues that required our attention: improperly installed roof, an HVAC system that was not fully functional AND improperly installed to the point that gas would leak when the valve was engaged, water leaks from the improperly installed roof, and many other problems. Additionally, the house had extremely significant termite damage through about 1/4 of the property, which we learned from EPest, a company that David partners with.

Ultimately, we decided to rescind our offer on the house because Mr. Monsivais was honest & straight-forward. What a RELIEF to have not wasted a significant amount of money in purchasing a money pit. We would have been upside-down in the house before we ever got in it, and David kept us from making a horrible mistake.

Mr. Monsivais ensured two things from us:
1) We will not hire another home inspector unless he's not available in our option period.
2) We will recommend him above all others to our friends.

Thank you, David. You have helped our family make a great decision during one of the most important periods in our lives.

We'll be hiring Mr. Monsivais again - hopefully, he'll have better news for us the second time around! We'll update this review with the outcome of the next inspection.
review.review_reply:
My sincere apologies for a delayed reply. I was looking back and noticed that I had not replied so I wanted to thank you for your kind words. I'm glad our services were helpful, of course not that we are here to make or break the deal, but to be informative of the condition of the home.
Thank you ...

review.comment: David is my GOTO inspector. His professionalism and thoroughness is what keeps me coming back. It dosent matter if its a first time home buyer or seasoned buyer, David shows the same respect and due-diligence with each and every client!!!
review.review_reply: Matt... you are certainly one professional of an agent sir... you so care about your customers... Kudos to you sir...

review.comment: Highly recommend Monsivais Inspections! David was so professional and organized, he took his time inspecting every bit of the house and gave me piece of mind knowing that my house was inspected by a top notch professional!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much. We certainly hope the information was useful. Thank you, feel free to contact us should you have questions in the future.

review.comment: He did a great job. Very detailed and was able to answer all my questions.
review.review_reply: Thank you, you had some great questions... always welcomed. Thank you again and reach should you have any questions in the future

review.comment: David inspected a home on very short notice. During the inspection he took the time to explain a lot to make sure I understood. On top of being very skilled and professional he is also very friendly. 10 out of 10 I would recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words. We hope all was informative and helpful.

review.comment: I had an inspection scheduled with David, and he went above and beyond to make sure I understood all the information. He was thorough and professional. I highly recommend using him and Orlando from epest.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much, we hope all was informative and helpful
Thank You Kris....

review.comment: David and his assistant were extremely thorough and explained everything in laymens terms that we could understand.  We are confident that nothing was over looked from minor cosmetic issues to potentially major issues.  He was also straight forward in recommending additional inspections by a specialist when he felt that more detailed knowledge was needed (for example: roofing)  We would recommend Monsivais Inspections to any BUYER OR SELLER!
review.review_reply:
Thank you much... you guys had some great questions and we know you were in tune throughout the inspection; nice work.

Please let us know how we can help should questions come up in the future.... Thank you again!

review.comment: David and his assistant (Orlando, maybe) were absolute super stars at our inspection yesterday! We had some very unreasonable sellers stay during the inspection and David was very respectful and professional the entire time. He was very thorough even with the uncomfortable situation and stayed to finish when most inspectors would have left after the way he was treated. I will definitely be recommending David for all of my clients and my personal inspections.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much Sarah, we hope everything was helpful and of course, purposeful. Please reach out should any questions come about... we'd love hearing from you guys.

review.comment: David and Vince are very knowledgeable, professional and friendly. Our family felt very safe having them inspect our house.
review.review_reply: Thank you much... It's always great to hear we were helpful. Please reach out should questions arise in the future… David

review.comment: David went above and beyond by adjusting his schedule to inspect a house while we were still on our house hunting trip in San Antonio.  Incredible service, very thorough and will certainly use again for our next home inspection (since the 1st house ended up falling through).  And spent a good amount of time making sure we understood the things he pointed out.  Thank you, David, for all your efforts!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kindness, It's always a great compliment when we have been helpful. Thank you again and know we are here should you have questions in the future.... congratulations!

review.comment: David helped me inspect two homes and did excellent work using the latest equipment. Unlike many other inspectors he has a team, and they provide an extremely professional level of care.
review.review_reply: Thank you Jack... My apologies for such a delayed response... you come with great questions and an awesome vision, and thank you for your comments... Please know we are a phone call away should any questions come up.

review.comment: If you are looking for an inspector that won't let you down, David is your guy! David is a top professional and very meticulous. I have had the pleasure of working with him for 3 homes now and I will continue to use him as my inspector due to the quality of work provided and his ability to articulate potential issues. When it comes to likely the largest investment you are going to make, the cost for a quality inspector is a drop in the bucket. I am certain David has saved me thousands in repairs and time I would never get back. The reports are thorough and easy to understand with plenty of pictures and he is timely with his delivery. He has all the latest tech to ensure you are getting the most accurate inspection possible, i.e. thermal imaging and foundation survey equipment. I can't recommend his services enough!
review.review_reply:
Eric, my apologies for such a late response... but we found it necessary to reach out and thank you for your comments... It was definitely a pleasure working with you and thank you for your trust in our services. It's always heart warming to see we could be of service and be helpful.
Reach out should you have questions in the future.

review.comment: I had an inspection done today and let me tell you that Monsivais Inspections is very knowledgeable. My report was delivered fast with very detailed information. Monsivais Inspections is more than 5 stars all the way. They are at your location on time and work until everything is reviewed and completed. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a home inspector. This is someone you can defiantly trust all the way to deliver a well all around report. I like the fact that there is so much degree of knowledge and integrity that goes into your inspection. Thank you Monsivais for everything done today. I am very pleased, and beyond satisfied with all your work. Will definitely  be recommending you.
review.review_reply:
Thank you so very much Angie. Certainly hope it's been helpful. Please reach out should you have any questions in the future. Your questions are always welcomed.
Thank you again...

review.comment: Hello. Monsivais Inspections did an amazing job absolutely phenomenal work. I was impressed with his knowledge and thoroughness of his report. Highly recommend! Absolutely will use his services again.
review.review_reply: Jon, I have no clue how this one got by... but I needed to reach out and thank you for you kindness... I'm so excited we were able to hep you in your buying process.

review.comment:
I usually don't leave reviews but I was super impressed with his thoroughness and his professionalism and I had to leave a review.  He took his time explaining every question I had (and I had a lot of questions) patiently and in detail.

My brother found him through Google search and I'm glad he did! Very pleased with the service we received.
review.review_reply:
Thank you so very much... I love being helpful and purposeful which is the reason I went on my own years ago... please know we are here should you have any questions in the future...
Be blessed
Thank you again!

review.comment:
David was a great home inspector.

He inspected my brothers along with mine home(s) and he was very thorough on his reports. He was very quick to deliver the inspection report to us.

We are very happy with our decision in choosing David as our home inspector. We will definitely be calling him back to make sure our home builders fixed what he found needed to be fixed.
review.review_reply:
Thank you so very much and congratulations to both of you on your new homes.... I look forward to the year-end inspection but should any concerns arise in the interim, please know we’re only a phone call away.... again
Thank you

review.comment: David went above and beyond to do an outstanding job inspecting a home we may be purchasing.  As first-time home buyers, we were overwhelmed with the process so he took time to talk with me over the phone to thoroughly explain his credentials and work-experience which was crucial to my decision on selecting an inspector.  He easily inspected the roof of the home that we were told was unsafe to do by other inspectors.  He worked with us and made a point to describe exactly what his reports meant.  Most importantly, he offered genuine advice that was invaluable to our decision making process.  I can't imagine a better experience for us.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for choosing our company, we are so grateful that our service is helpful. Know that we are here to help you, we’re just a phone call away.

review.comment: Very honest man! He has my complete respect
review.review_reply: Thank you so much, we are just a call away should you have questions. I’m so happy to help.

review.comment: Being a first time homebuyer I was looking for a good inspector. David was very knowledgeable and made me feel at ease. Would recommend him to anyone. I had a great experience!
review.review_reply:
Thank you much.. please don’t hesitate to contact us should you have any questions...
Thank you

review.comment: David was great, friendly and very detailed.  I met David at the end of the inspection to review any major items and understand his findings.  David provided the inspection report within 12 hours and gave recommendations on upkeep.  Thank you David for providing such great service!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much... we love what we do... please let me know know how we can help ... don’t hesitate to call us.

review.comment: David did a great job with my inspection.  It was very through and the inspection report was provided to me the same day.  Overall I was happy with the details reported in the inspection.  Only four stars because  it was not disclosed until AFTER the inspection that David does not inspect 220 volt.outlets.  "Complete inspection including electrical" was promised.  Not complete - excluding 220 volt.
review.review_reply: Thank you for Expressing your concern. The Texas Real Estate Commission  does have standards of practice basically the do and don’ts of what the inspector should do and shall not. There is the link to the commission on my website and the entire SOP is available.

review.comment: David is probably one of the best inspectors I've come across so far. He was extremely thorough, explaining probable causes and needed fixes down to the fine detail through out the entire inspection. He is really friendly, and will answer any questions you may have to the best of his ability. You will not regret using David as your inspector. He's phenomenal!
review.review_reply: I am so grateful for your comments, thank you. And my sincere apologies for the delayed response I’m not sure how this one got buried in my day today but I wanted to take a moment to say thank you and should you need anything in the future we’re just a call away. Again thank you so much.

review.comment: I spent several days on google trying to search for the right inspector.  After many phone calls and talking to many inspectors, everything was very overwhelming for me. David was the last person that I called and I immediately knew after my conversation with him that he was the perfect choice.  He took the time to explain to me his entire process.  And he told me that if I wanted to hire his company, give him a call back to schedule.  I  told him that I needed to talk to my husband about everything. I seriously  sent him a text within 10 minutes  and told him that he was hired.  Later that day, he sent me an awesome video of him working on a roof.  Fast forward to today, our inspection day, David showed up right before our appointment time.  He introduced himself and told us what to expect and he immediately got to work.  He walked us through the entire inspection and explained everything to us. I was amazed at how thorough he was.  After reading all the amazing reviews about his company, it is what I expected, but to actually see it happening was a very good feeling and I knew I made the perfect choice.  David has amazing rates and  you will not regret hiring him for your home inspection.  He is super friendly and I am very happy with our selection.
review.review_reply: Thank you so very much. Know we are here for you should questions arise, just reach out and we'll try get you what need asap. Be blessed

review.comment: We needed a next-day inspection and David was able to move his schedule to accommodate us. He took the time to explain everything and took about 3 hours to complete the inspection, we were very satisfied and  plan to use his services again. We would recommend him any time!
review.review_reply: Thank you Ken, I'm glad we could be of service. Should you have any questions in the future know that I'm only a call, text, or email away.

review.comment: WOW! Thanx David.  What a thorough job. Went the extra mile to kindly Wd40 my roof vent that was squealing.  Also, he was able to unscrew my vent hood halogen light that had been stuck oh, for about 10 years. Seems trivial, but, not to me. Knowledgeable, helpful, thorough; can't go wrong with David. David knows his stuff.
review.review_reply: Awe, Thank you Nancy always a pleasure to be helpful. I hope all works out with your plans. Should you need any assistance in the future and know that we’re only a call away and however we can help. Again, thank you so much.

review.comment: David inspected 2 homes for my family. He is extremely thorough, flexible, knowledgeable and professional. He re-arranged his personal schedule on more than one occasion because he knew we were on a tight timeline. He also provided an extremely thorough report to us within 24 hrs on three different occasions.  He took his time explaining issues to us and never seemed to be rushing his work.  I would highly recommend him to anyone who wants a true thorough inspection.  If it weren't for him, I think we'd currently be in a house with many expensive fixes.
review.review_reply: Oh my gosh! My sincere apologies for a delayed response, this must have gotten away with me I’m glad that I am reviewing my entire year and saw this. Thank you so much for your trust in our services and no should you need anything in the future, we are just a call away. Again thank you very much.
